content.title: Official Detroit Red Wings Website | Detroit Red Wings
content.metaDescription: The official National Hockey League website including news, rosters, stats, schedules, teams, and video.
content.content:
[## RECAP: Appleton, Talbot lead the way as Red Wings take down Panthers, 4-1 Detroit extends winning streak to three straight games, has outscored opponents 13-6 in current stretch](/redwings/news/recap-appleton-talbot-lead-the-way-as-red-wings-take-down-panthers-4-1)    [### PREVIEW: Red Wings begin three-game homestand, go for third consecutive win when Panthers visit on Wednesday](/redwings/news/preview-red-wings-begin-three-game-homestand-go-for-third-consecutive-win-when-panthers-visit-on-wednesday)   [### RECAP: Detroit ‘got contributions from everyone’ in 3-2 win at Toronto](/redwings/news/recap-detroit-got-contributions-from-everyone-in-3-2-win-at-toronto)   [### PREVIEW: Red Wings hit the road for Monday matinee in Toronto](/redwings/news/preview-red-wings-hit-the-road-for-monday-matinee-in-toronto)       Top Stories

- [PREVIEW: Red Wings begin three-game homestand, go for third consecutive win when Panthers visit on Wednesday](/redwings/news/preview-red-wings-begin-three-game-homestand-go-for-third-consecutive-win-when-panthers-visit-on-wednesday)
 
- [RECAP: Detroit ‘got contributions from everyone’ in 3-2 win at Toronto](/redwings/news/recap-detroit-got-contributions-from-everyone-in-3-2-win-at-toronto)
 
- [PREVIEW: Red Wings hit the road for Monday matinee in Toronto](/redwings/news/preview-red-wings-hit-the-road-for-monday-matinee-in-toronto)
 
- [Yzerman says Red Wings’ rookie trio ‘exceeded our expectations’ this fall en route to earning 2025-26 Opening Night roster spots](/redwings/news/yzerman-says-red-wings-rookie-trio-exceeded-our-expectations-this-fall-en-route-to-earning-2025-26-opening-night-roster-spots)
 
- [RECAP: Red Wings ‘dug in a little bit more,’ rally for 6-3 victory over Maple Leafs](/redwings/news/recap-red-wings-dug-in-a-little-bit-more-en-route-to-6-3-victory-over-maple-leafs)

Red Wings sign Carter Bear to three-year, entry-level contract        Forward was selected 13th overall by Detroit at 2025 NHL Entry Draft
Red Wings wrap up weekend in Los Angeles with Day 2 of 2025 NHL Entry Draft        In addition to selecting seven prospects, Detroit acquires netminder John Gibson via trade with Anaheim on Saturday
Red Wings select seven players on second day of 2025 NHL Entry Draft        Four forwards, two defenseman and one goaltender chosen by Detroit in Los Angeles
Red Wings activate James Van Riemsdyk from non-roster status        Detroit assigns Erik Gustafsson to Grand Rapids
Detroit Red Wings announce details for Opening Night, Red Carpet Walk and what fans can expect throughout Red Wings Centennial
Red Wings reduce roster to 23        Detroit opens 100th season on Thursday, Oct. 9 with home game against Montréal Canadiens at 7:00 p.m. at Little Caesars Arena
Nicklas Lidstrom: The Perfect Defenseman, The Perfect Teammate, The Perfect Human         Immortal Red Wings blueliner dominated the NHL with his all-around consistency and mistake-free game
Henrik Zetterberg: Fatherly Advice Set the Stage for Stellar Red Wings Career        Seventh-round pick became a Stanley Cup champion, Conn Smythe Trophy winner and Red Wings captain
Jonathan Ericsson: Last Player Selected in 2002 NHL Draft, “Big E”         Against the odds, Ericsson became vital piece of Detroit’s defensive corps
With 2025 Training Camp as backdrop, Red Wings make sizable impact on Traverse City community
2024-25 Red Wings for Reading program impacted 10,000 students in metro Detroit
Red Wings honored to host Special Olympics Michigan athletes for practice, hockey skills clinic
Lyon visits New Paradigm Glazer Academy in Detroit, helps launch 2024 Red Wings for Reading Program
